WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor servers uptime
WorkflowInfo.Description: Checking the uptime of list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:Ping;Assembly=Ping, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:SystemUptime;Assembly=SystemUptime, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:AddMemoryTableRow;Assembly=AddMemoryTableRow, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="UptimeReport" RowNumber="1" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Uptime-Days" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <Server_Name />
 <Uptime-Days />
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping1" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Ping" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="-2" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="Check_Status"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="Server_UP"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:SystemUptime IsValid="True" x:Name="systemUptime1" TimeInterval="Days" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Get System Uptime" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the operating system's uptime in seconds" HostId="-2" TypeName="SystemUptime" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="120" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 120" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%UptimeReport%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="UptimeReport" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <ns11:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%ServerName%" RowNumber="%getRowsCount2%" VariableName="%UptimeReport%" x:Name="setServerName" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns11:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%SystemUptime1%" RowNumber="%getRowsCount2%" VariableName="%UptimeReport%" x:Name="setUptime" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns12:AddMemoryTableRow Selection="2" IsValid="True" x:Name="addMemoryTableRow1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%UptimeReport%" RowNumber="" NumberOfRows="1" ResultSetName="UptimeReport" Description="Add a memory table row." DisplayName="Add Row to Memory Table" TypeName="AddMemoryTableRow" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="120" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<=" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& <= 120" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="Server_Down"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%UptimeReport%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="Email" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="servers uptime report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table which contains server names, and for each server checks the current uptime. If the uptime exceeds a pre-defined threshold, the server name is added to an HTML report and sent to relevant personnel.
